website_summaries.verdict: An ideal choice for occasional party hosts who want to upgrade from disposable serving pans but not invest in commercial-grade chafing equipment.
pros: Affordable upgrade from disposable chafing dishes
Includes dripless water pan, dome cover, and two liquid fuel holders
cons: Thin metal construction – not commercial grade

customer_reviews.title: super dangerous unfinished edges!!
customer_reviews.text: unbelievably dangerous! The edges of the pan are not properly finished. Here's what happened to my wife when she was washing them in the sink. Reached in to grab one and sliced her hand wide open. A trip to the hospital and 5 stitches later she had to have a splint on her hand for 2 days. I hope these guys have good product liability coverage?! see picture
customer_reviews.author: Brayden

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: The main product feature that I was seeking is NOT a part of this design. While the quality is acceptable, there is NO 1/3 TRAY FEATURE, which is what attracted me to this purchase. Now I am in the same boat as I started trying to find a SEGMENTED chafing dish set. Unfortunately, NEITHER of the advertised items came as described. (I ordered identical items from two separate vendors).
customer_reviews.author: All Grand

customer_reviews.title: 2 dome covers and four fuel holders Stainless steel mirror finished cover Frame has two built-in hooks to hold the cover Superio
customer_reviews.text: It was suppose to be a set of 2 Chafing pans but all I received was 1. This is what it says "About this item Features Includes 2 full size food pans, 2-1/2 inch deep, 2 dripless water pans, 2 dome covers and four fuel holders Stainless steel mirror finished cover Frame has two built-in hooks to hold the cover Superior Quality Graded"
customer_reviews.author: KEVIN ADCOCK

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Set it up and used it at a pot luck last weekend. By boiling water on propane stove first before putting in bottom tray, then heating food before putting in top tray, this did a good job of keeping the meats hot using Sternos. After getting it set up, just before serving we removed the sterno cans and the water pan kept the food hot til it was all gone. After the food tray was emptied, people put a couple one-use aluminum trays in the upper pan with smaller amounts of other food and it warmed those in about 5 minutes, too.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Polly

customer_reviews.title: Sharing this review so maybe others can know like I didn't what the cheaper option of 'used' could ...
customer_reviews.text: Sharing this review so maybe others can know like I didn't what the cheaper option of 'used' could mean. This chafing dish box was damaged in shipping, taped up and then sold to me as used. It is lightweight metal so the pans and the stand were bent. I was able to straighten them out, but it wobbles a little. Still it was worth the discounted price $10 less. Buying a quality chafing dish was not possible at ten times the cost. And, this one worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny
customer_reviews.text: This is the first chafer I've ever used, and it was very easy to figure out (which is good, because there were no instructions in the box). It worked better than I imagined. I made something similar to pigs-in-a-blanket, but with rolled up bacon (bake it first, if you try this) and crescent roll dough. They were served at a baby shower, and stayed nice and hot for 2 hours. Everyone was very impressed with it, and several people said they thought it was so neat that they are now planning to get one.
customer_reviews.author: ikandi

customer_reviews.title: Work great, Easy to get started using it
customer_reviews.text: We bought several for an event. We use them regularly for our business, and they work great. These were super easy to use and easy to store. The price is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Loera

customer_reviews.title: Sharp edges!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The looks of these were nice and functionality was perfect for what we were looking for. However when I went to prepare to use them I cut myself several times trying to wash them before using. One cut was as I was drying and dropped the pan resulting in a cut on my hardwood floor. It literally looks like someone put a knife through the floor. Maybe it's just the 2 plans I've purchased but I decided not to even use them if my guests were going to have the same problem. No one needs blood in their food!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara P.

customer_reviews.title: the metal seems pretty thin and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the metal seems pretty thin and flimsy. Haven't used it yet but stand seems a llttle wobbly. Hopefully, the wieght of food/water will make it less wobbly. Can't complain too much because the price is right and I guess I could pay more for a better grade. It's not beautiful, but it's better than throw-aways. Don't think my guest will care on way or the other.
customer_reviews.author: meme

customer_reviews.title: Winware Stainless Steel Chafer
customer_reviews.text: I purchased four (4) Winware Stainless Steel Chafer last October to use at my daughter's Dedication Celebration, as well as, future events. We, my husband & I, have a lot of family and friends that celebrate anything and everything! Our families and friends often rent or borrow buffet servers/chafing dishes. We're first time parents and first time homeowners so it made sense to invest in our own rather than rent or borrow. I'm a bit upset to discover the current price is half of what I paid last October but for the quality of this product, the price I paid had been worth it.
customer_reviews.author: My.

customer_reviews.title: a very happy daughter!!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this chaffing dish set for my daughter. we had seen this item in use at a baby homecoming party in Sept. My daughter kept commenting on how great the chaffing dish was and wanted to purchase one. When i surprised her with it she was THRILLED and told me about all the uses she was going to have for this wonderful item. Thank You Amazon for making this affordable to be able to surprise my dear daughter. gma m
customer_reviews.author: gma m

customer_reviews.title: CHAFING DISHES FOR THE WEDDING
customer_reviews.text: NEEDED THESE CHAFING DISHES FOR MY YOUNGEST DAUGHTER'S WEDDING AND PRICED RENTING THEM FOR ONE DAY USE. BY THE TIME I SUBTRACTED THE RENTAL FEE FOR ONE DAY FROM THE COST OF THESE THAT I BOUGHT, I WOUND UP PAYING ONLY $11.37 FOR EACH OF THEM. THE BONUS IS THAT I HAVE THEM FOR ALL FUTURE EVENTS AT NO COST. THEY WERE ALSO NICER THAN THE ONE'S FROM THE RENTAL PLACE. THEY WORKED GREAT AND I WOULD RECOMMEND THESE TO ANYONE. THANKS FOR A GREAT PRODUCT AND A GREAT DEAL.
customer_reviews.author: Les Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Saftey First
customer_reviews.text: The Newburg Chafers work great and have replaced the dangerous aluminum wire racks. We use them for snow duty and have over 20 different people that can set up the trays; we need safety. We have also learned that you can burn food over time; turn off one burner after water has heated. the single burner can keep the warmth.
customer_reviews.author: GLM

customer_reviews.title: Its okay!
customer_reviews.text: The stainless material is very thin, but for the price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Maluhia

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these chafers and was immediately disappointed upon opening the first one. Edges were bent and the box that contains the extra handle and fuel holders was opened and the items were just rolling around inside of the big box. When I opened the second one and there were no bent edges or open packaging, I made the assumption that I must have received a previously opened box. They are a decent quality for the price you pay for them. I'm pleased thus far. I was thinking that 8 quarts is larger than what it really is! Other than that, I would recommend for people having parties or get togethers but not for catering events.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Arambula

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking product, but works.
customer_reviews.text: I received the chafer with scratches on the finish right out of the box. The product seems to be poorly made; however it does do the job. I was looking for something a little nicer in quality and finish. Its hard to tell from some photos what you are really going to get. Thank God for Amazon's awesome return policy.
customer_reviews.author: J.R.

customer_reviews.title: Product is Great!  The packaging for shipping HUGE Disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: LOve the dishes. Good value. I was very dissapointed with the packaging of the product. They taped the two boxes together with very minimal cushion for delivery. One of the stands was slightly bent. My husband was able to fix it. I would recommend buying the product. But they need to do a better job of packing...
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Baker

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful! We made over 400 appetizers for the http
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! We made over 400 appetizers for the  Valentines dance and these were light to carry (after empty of course) lol What I would like to find out though is, if there is a divider so I could put 2 small detached dishes in, my refrig is on the small side. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: lynda

customer_reviews.title: This is the second one I bought and I like it. The edges are sharp so please hold ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I bought and I like it. The edges are sharp so please hold it with two small towels or something.
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Well made, sturdy, excellent quality for catering or big dinners!!
customer_reviews.author: A. Quiñones

customer_reviews.title: Thin and small
customer_reviews.text: Lots off dented edges, thin metal and 8 quarts is the base, you may get half of that in the 3 pieces
customer_reviews.author: darren w.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. Just used it once so I will update when I get more use out of it to see how it hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Serving Dish
customer_reviews.text: OK...so I needed something for the buffet line at my daughters wedding....this worked great and looked very professional...then I decided to keep use it for corn on the cob when we barbque...then I found it kept hot dogs warm until the grandkids were ready to eat...fill it with boiling water...use a candle or sterno..and it lasts for hours....easy to clean, easy to store...more versatile than I ever thought!!
customer_reviews.author: mary guldager

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for the $$$$
customer_reviews.text: This product was a great buy!!! This is a Great starter/home owner product. I bought 4 of them and they worked for what I needed for sure. The metal is a little thin but still worked great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the cost it did exactly what we needed it to do.... I’m sure they will work for our needs a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Boughner

customer_reviews.title: they look great, come with extra handles if you don't like ...
customer_reviews.text: We use these every holiday without fail or trouble, they look great, come with extra handles if you don't like the black and they look classy! We host thanksgiving for 12 people with 2 of these and a 3-piece small crock-pot set with now problem!
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Great Chafing Dish for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great unit for the prize, full pan size. Keeps the food hot as long as the Sterno is lit. Fill with boiling water just before you add the pan with food. Nicely decorate the buffet line, fill the chafing dish with high quality, good tasting food, remove the lid(s) when you start serving and none of your guests will ever think that the quality of the chafing dish is too cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Dumpling111

customer_reviews.title: Light duty chafer
customer_reviews.text: The chafer came quickly and the box was in good shape. Having used chafers for many years, it is definitely a lite duty model. Alas, for the two family events a year it works well!
customer_reviews.author: L Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These chafer dishes are very nice. The quality is also high.
customer_reviews.author: sherique dill

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product...Better price....Must buy for someone who hosts multiple parties a year.
customer_reviews.text: Love this chafing dish....I have yet to use them but I can tell I really like this product...It was time to replace old chafers...Looks shiny and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: RioHard91

customer_reviews.title: Mid range chaffer
customer_reviews.text: This chafer is a good alternative to the semi-disposable ones and chafing units that cost over $100. Comes witha stainless handle ehich looks better
customer_reviews.author: Steve STop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Great to have for parties
customer_reviews.text: This is the one purchase that I'm glad I made. This Chaffing dish is a life saver. Heating up food and keeping it warm through a party is sometimes key to making sure the food gets eaten. This is a must have for your party
customer_reviews.author: Cockers in Larsworld

customer_reviews.title: Used the chafer dishes for Christmas they were excellent. I served dinner buffet style and everything was ...
customer_reviews.text: Used the chafer dishes for Christmas they were excellent. I served dinner buffet style and everything was organized with them. I would order them again for the price.

customer_reviews.title: I rate this product as a 5
customer_reviews.text: This chafer was better than what I expected. I am very pleased with them,- the price, the size is bigger, and the quality is excellent. Better than I have at my local store. The handles are sturdy. I would recommend this product.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: ... of wear and tear is is still holding up pretty

customer_reviews.title: Great replacement! The box arrived in shreds

customer_reviews.title: It is sturdy and works very well
customer_reviews.text: This product is exactly as described. It is sturdy and works very well. We hosted a party of 40 for 7+ hours and these were perfect. We purchased 3. Will probably purchase another 2. Definitely recommend this product to others!

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The 8 qt chafing dish met all my expectations. I may order a second one as well.

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for home parties. I ordered these mid day on a Monday and received them before noon on that Wednesday. I work for a catering company and these seem to be the same quality and appearance as to what we use.

customer_reviews.title: It worked wonderfully.
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with the quality of this product. It worked wonderfully.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What We Needed
customer_reviews.text: There are some negative reviews about this, and yes, this is not the most professional option you can get. However, if you are looking for something practical that will get the job done at a reasonable price, this is exactly what you need. The black plastic handle in the picture makes it look cheap, but it comes with a chrome handle you can put on which classes it up.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I do love these. I have so many events at my house, and I am always cooking. I am glad I invested in these. They are sturdy and do the job.

customer_reviews.text: This is the model professional caterers use. Very good price, works like a charm. The fuel that comes with it is top rate. Replace with only that.

customer_reviews.title: it did the job
customer_reviews.text: I liked the warmers alot but wished they had more info on it for instructions for the heat...or instructions at all...lol. I was very pleased to see how large it was and how hot my food stayed. Good prices. And Amazon shipped when they ON TIME!! I love amazon! Also dont really like the heat "adjustment". They were hard to turn down the heat let alone turn off...i had to blow it out totally. This is inconvenient, its eather really hot! or not. But it did the job cause all i wanted was warmers that could hold a lot of food and kept it hot! It did :).

customer_reviews.title: MADE IN CHINA.  These will be junk in a year under heavy usage.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these for home use. Hosting house parties, Christmas, Thanksgiving etc. I have commercial cooking background and these a most definitely NOT commercial grade. Extremely light gauge. I can see why some buyers have reported being cut by the edges. I will keep these as I will use them lightly. But if I had a bit more time before our weekend party I would have returned and found better quality.

customer_reviews.text: We discovered that it takes 3 rentals and this product is paid for. So we bought it and love it. Same quality (if not better) as the rental. Wish I'd bought it earlier.

customer_reviews.title: Works for us.........
customer_reviews.text: Amazon got this to us in grand fashion. Won't get used until Thanksgiving though. We been wanting another one for quite some time. Now with two, all servings will be nice-n-hot at any time. When we all get seated at the table that is and give thanks first. Then it's help yourself. We'll be using the large included trays for carved/sliced up Turkey and Ham in one then Boiled Shrimp and Baked Red Snapper in the other.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. H.

customer_reviews.title: good quality for a reasonable price

customer_reviews.title: it is a great value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I expected this to be heavier. The sterno left burn marks on the first use. If you want professional quality, this is not it. If you plan to use this occasionally, it is a great value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha Fortune

customer_reviews.title: Good Product, Good Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought four of these from Amazon and they performed exceptionally well on a buffet line. Consistently well made and for $28, a bargin. I probably wouldn't use them with sterling, crystal and Royal Daulton but they did fine with 18-8 stainless and rented glasses.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 chafing dishes for a party I'm throwing next weekend. They look great and will make serving and keeping food hot very easy. I like the fact you can slide the lid onto the 2 clips on the frame to hold the lid.

customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these chafers and I absolutely love them! We had an anniversary party for my parents and we decided to do mostly appetizers and so they were perfect. They are very good quality and they cleaned very easy. I know it sounds funny, but I loved the boxes they come in. Has a handle for easy transport. I would definitely recommend these to anyone. Thrilled with my purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Great Chafing Pan
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase!! Light guage metal but worked PERFECTLY for our funtion right out of the box. Shipping arrived on time as promised (2 hours before party) Very Satisfied. Cant wait top use them again.
customer_reviews.author: G. Rozanski

customer_reviews.title: easily burn, and not NSF certified is what these ...
customer_reviews.text: Extremely cheap, easily burn, and not NSF certified is what these are. Sams Club sells an excellent, inexpensive one for $39.58.

customer_reviews.title: I brought 3 of these my revits came out of ...
customer_reviews.text: I brought 3 of these my revits came out of one of them on the bracket but it's too late to send back and I didn't get to use that bracket!
customer_reviews.author: Shawanna Evans

product_meta.title: Tiger Chef 8 Quart Full Size Stainless Steel Chafer and 3 1/3rd Size Chafing Dishes Food Pans and Cool-Touch Plastic on Top
feature_bullets: COMPLETE CHAFER KIT: Our complete chafer set includes a full-size water pan, full size food pan, 3 1/3rd size food pans, dome cover, collapsible stand, 2 fuel holders with covers
DURABLE STAINLESS-STEEL NSF CERTIFIED: Despite being foldable this full-size chafer is constructed of quality stainless steel with a mirror satin finish and is NSF CERTIFIED
VERSATILE: This chafer comes with a full and 3 1/3rd size food pans to accommodate various dish sizes. In addition, the frame features two built-in hooks to hold the covers
DISHWASHER SAFE: The food pans, water pan and cover are dishwasher safe. Wash the other parts with soap and water
